post.title: TxDOT
post.description: The Texas Department of Transportation is the state agency charged with planning and building mobility infrastructure.

node.title: TxDOT should protect all Houstonians. But their I-45 expansion would pave over some.

children.text: TxDOT seems to be ignoring President Bill Clinton's 1994 Executive Order binding projects that receive federal funding to protect communities like Near Northside, East End and Fifth Ward.

mainImage.alt: A deal made in the last legislative session will send money meant to reduce air pollution from old vehicles to TxDOT, making it even harder for the state to address longstanding environmental injustice.
